keywords: audit right, customer, penetration testing by customers

name: EncryptionPolicyCheckQ4
description: Which TLS features are defined in the policy?
keywords: encryption, best practice, TLS, secure configuration.transport layer encryption

name: TransportEncryptionEnforced
description: This metric is used to assess if the cloud service/asset enforces encrypted connections.

name: EncryptionPolicyCheckQ1
description: How are passwords or keys encrypted?
keywords: password, cryptography, data at rest protection

name: DigitalCertPolicy01
description: Which verifiable certificated are supported for Certificaiton Authorities?
keywords: digital certificates, PKI, CA, x509, certificate authorities, publicly verifiable

name: VulnerabilityManagementPolicyQ1
description: How does vulnerability information is gathered and forwarded?
keywords: vulnerability management, manual, automated, semi-automated, technical vulnerability management

name: JavaVersion
description: This metric is used to assess the Java Runtime version used by the cloud service/asset.

name: TransportEncryptionEnabled
description: This metric is used to assess if the cloud service/asset accepts encrypted connections.

name: EncryptionPolicyCheckQ3
description: What encryption type is used?
keywords: encryption, cryptography, data at rest protection

name: EventMonitoringPolicyCheckQ2
description: In which type of facility are SIEM events stored?
keywords: logging, monitoring, SIEM, central, Security Information and Event Management

name: PolicyUpToDateCheck
description: This metric checks whether the policy document is up-to-date. It measures the time since creation/last modification up to the point of time during assessment. This time shall be smaller then a given threshold.

name: AutomaticUpdatesInterval
description: This metric is used to assess the update interval of automatic updates for the cloud service/asset.

name: BusinessContinuityPolicy03
description: Which architectural aspects are defined in the business continuity plan?
keywords: bcm, business continuity, redundancy, availability, multi-datacenter architecture
